mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id AS commentId, c.created_at AS createAt, c.content, u.user_id AS userId, u.profile_image AS profileImage, u.username AS username, u.nickname AS nickname FROM comment c JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.post_id = #{userId}

SELECT c.comment_id AS commentId, c.created_at AS createdAt, c.content, u.user_id AS userId, u.profile_image AS profileImage, u.username AS username, u.nickname AS nickname, p.title AS postTitle FROM comment c JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id JOIN post p ON c.post_id = p.post_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND c.is_deleted = false
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (content, created_at, updated_at, is_deleted, depth, user_id, post_id) VALUES (#{content}, NOW(), NOW(), false, 0, #{userId}, #{postId})
